summary: Be warned good travellers this potion requires great responsibility!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: (16/12/2012)

*** I will be uploading a \'Lazy Pig Cheat Guide\' for people who want the locations.

*** Secondly, I will be adding more potion types & quantity after I have finished by dungeon:    \'Blackmane Pitfall (Currently: 10% complete)


There was a time when pure might and hard metal could rule the world.

Long ago a prophecy was fortold of a potion which, under consumption, could scorch the earth allaround the barer while at the exact same time make him part of the netherworld.

I, my friends, know what has been foretold. That only true Dragonborns & Moth Priests of the 4th Tier could sense the \"Master of the Heart\" potions. 

Furthermore, that Sheogorath took it upon himself to put such a destructive force within all inns of Skyrim. Preposterous though this may sound, Only a Dragonborn or Moth Priest of the 4th Tier could prove this legend true or false.


I strongly suggest starting your search in the RIVERWOOD INN known as the Sleeping Giant.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Search High  - Search Low  - BUT Search Inside Only Hollow Containers! 

(Such a potion would not fit inside a mere mortal Wardrobe or Chest Ba ha ha!


Good Luck my friends!
